page.title: 02WATER SUPPLY AND AMENITIES
page.content: Most of the land in the survey area is owned by the North West Water Authority, though much of it is being sold off at the present time. Belmont Reservoir, to the north of the village, is a compensation reservoir. It is used by Bolton Sailing Club. A new supply{reservoir}for Belmont is nearing completion. It is situated on the north-eastern side of Winter Hill. The other major water feature in the area is Ward's Reservoir, known generally as "The Blue Lagoon". This is owned by the Belmont Bleaching and Dyeing Company and formerly supplied water to power its mill. Today the Blue Lagoon is a popular place of {recreation}, used particularly for {windsurfing}and{canoeing}. In summer the approach to it, along Rivington Road, is often heavily congested with parked vehicles.
